README:
# ergam
The R package allows to fit an Exponential Random Graph Additive Model (ERGAM) 
with non-parametric smooth components to subsets of a network. 
The subsets are chosen based on a symmetric Latin square.

For details on the methodology see:
Thiemichen, S. and Kauermann, G. (2016). Stable exponential random graph models with
non-parametric components for large dense networks. arXiv preprint arXiv:1604.04732.
http://arxiv.org/abs/1604.04732
